sentences.sentence: They will scourge thee, the stony-hearted wretches!
sentences.translation: 他们会鞭打你，这些铁石心肠的坏蛋！

sentences.sentence: They tried to change the topic, but his fears were aroused, and he pursued it, "Will they scourge thee?"
sentences.translation: 她们试图改变话题，但他的恐惧被激起了，他继续说：“他们会折磨你们吗？”

sentences.sentence: Inflation was the scourge of the 1970s.
sentences.translation: 通货膨胀曾是20世纪70年代的祸患。
